item.Q:
Write the character:
manner; pattern; way; appearance; shape
item.A:
traditional: 樣
yàng
这样 (這樣) zhèyàng this (kind of, sort of); this way; such; like this; such

cǐ
因此 yīncǐ that is why; for that reason; therefore; for this reason

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: (modal particle indicating polite suggestion); ...right?; ...OK?
2: (onomat.); dumb
item.A: 1: ba 2: bā

item.Q:
Write the character:
position; location; (classifier for people); place; seat
item.A:
wèi
单位 (單位) dānwèi a unit; unit (of measure); work unit (one's workplace)

item.Q:
Write the character:
to do; to make; to regard as; to take sb for
item.A:
zuò
工作 gōngzuò job; work; construction; task

item.Q:
Write the character:
reason; logic; science; inner principle or structure
item.A:
lǐ
管理 guǎnlǐ to supervise; to manage; to administer; management; administration

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: all right; capable; competent; OK; okay; to go; to do; to travel; temporary; to walk; to go; will do
2: a row; profession; professional
item.A:
1: xíng 2: háng
进行 (進行) jìnxíng to advance; to conduct; underway; in progress; to do; to carry out; to carry on; to conduct; to execute 银行 (銀行) yínháng bank

item.Q:
Write the character: yàng
(zhèyàng de yàng)
item.A:
traditional: 樣
manner; pattern; way; appearance; shape
这样 (這樣) zhèyàng this (kind of, sort of); this way; such; like this; such

item.Q:
Write the character: cǐ
(yīncǐ de cǐ)
item.A:
this; these
因此 yīncǐ that is why; for that reason; therefore; for this reason
(modal particle indicating polite suggestion); ...right?; ...OK?
(onomat.); dumb

item.Q:
Write the character: zhě
(huòzhě de zhě)
item.A:
-ist, -er (person); person (who does sth)
或者 huòzhě or; possibly; maybe; perhaps

traditional: 同樣
tóngyàng same; equal; equivalent

traditional: 小樣
xiǎoyàng (print.) galley proof

traditional: 樣子
yàngzi manner; air; looks; aspect

traditional: 樣本
yàngběn sample; specimen

traditional: 樣樣
yàngyàng all kinds

traditional: 樣機
yàngjī prototype

traditional: 看樣子
kànyàngzi it seems; it looks as if

traditional: 這樣
zhèyàng this (kind of, sort of); this way; such; like this; such

traditional: 那樣
nàyàng that kind; that sort
yīncǐ that is why; for that reason; therefore; for this reason
rúcǐ in this way; so
jiùcǐ and thus; thereupon
cǐshì this matter

traditional: 此後
cǐhòu after this; afterwards; hereafter

traditional: 此時
cǐshí now; this moment

traditional: 為此
wèicǐ for this reason; with regards to this; in this respect; in order to do this; to this end
wèizi place; seat

traditional: 個位
gèwèi the units place (or column) in the decimal system
zàiwèi on the throne; reigning (monarch)
dìwèi position; status; place

traditional: 學位
xuéwèi educational level
dìngwèi position; location; localization

traditional: 對位
duìwèi counterpoint
fāngwèi direction; points of the compass; bearing; position; azimuth
běnwèi standard; one's own department or unit
zuòjīa author

traditional: 作對
zuòduì set oneself against; oppose; make a pair
zuòwén composition
zuòfǎ course of action; method of doing sth; practise; modus operandi

traditional: 作為
zuòwéi accomplish; action; to regard (sth as sth); to look upon (sth as); conduct
zuòyòng action; activity; actions; acts; effect; to play a role
dàzuò great piece
gōngzuò job; work; construction; task

traditional: 發作
fāzuò to flare-up; to break out
kànzuò look upon as; regard as
bùlǐ refuse to acknowledge; pay no attention to; take no notice of; ignore
shìlǐ reason; logic
dìlǐ geography

traditional: 地理學
dìlǐxué geography
Dàlǐ (N) Dali (place in Yunnan)
dìnglǐ an established theory; (math.) theorem
xīnlǐ mental; psychological

traditional: 心理學
xīnlǐxué psychology
qínglǐ reason; sense
fǎlǐ legal principle; jurisprudence
qīnglǐ clear; put in order; check up

traditional: 無理
wúlǐ irrational; unreasonable
lǐshì member of council

traditional: 理事會
lǐshìhuì council
lǐxiǎng ideal

traditional: 理所當然
lǐsuǒdāngrán (idiom) certainly; of course; it logically follows that...

traditional: 理會
lǐhuì pay attention to; take notice of
shēnglǐ physiology

traditional: 生理學
shēnglǐxué physiology
zhēnlǐ truth
zìlǐ (v); provide for oneself; take care of
dàolǐ reason; argument; sense; principle; basis; justification

yìxíng group
yīxíng party; delegation
bùxíng won't do; be out of the question; be no good; not work; not be capable
bùxíngle on the point of death; dying

Zhōngháng abbr. for Bank of China (BOC) 中国银行
zhōngháng Bank of China
rénxíngdào sidewalk
kěxíng feasible

tóngháng (n) person in the same business or occupation
tóngxíng journey together

běnháng one's line; one's own profession
běnxíng ones line

traditional: 現行
xiànxíng be in effect; in force

traditional: 發行
fāxíng publish; issue
zìxíng voluntary; autonomous; by oneself; self-
xíngshì execute; behavior
xíngrén pedestrian
hángjīa connoisseur; expert; veteran
hángqíng market price; quotation of market price; the current market situation

traditional: 行為
xíngwéi action; conduct; behavior; activity
zuòzhě author; writer
qiánzhě the former

traditional: 學者
xuézhě scholar
gōngzuòzhě worker

traditional: 後者
hòuzhě the latter
